name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior Support Engineer with a strong analytical mindset and exceptional troubleshooting abilities, leveraging 13+ years in technology to resolve complex issues across diverse systems, including **electromechanical systems**, **optics**, and **image processing**. A proactive problem-solver adept at fostering positive **customer relations** and collaborating within teams to drive effective solutions.
Possessing a robust technical background in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, I am well-versed in both frontend and backend environments, particularly with **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. My innovative approach has led to the development of AI/ML platforms that harness predictive analytics and automation, adapting seamlessly to the evolving demands of the healthcare and financial industries.
I have hands-on experience deploying cloud-native solutions via **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices and CI/CD practices to enhance performance and reliability. My commitment to compliance ensures alignment with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, while my expertise in MLOps tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** supports advanced model management.
